quotes.quote: The unpleasant events you are passing from will not have been profitless to you.
Evil is a miscellaneous collection of nasty things that nasty people do.
Man is the only creature who has a nasty mind.
One of the worst things about life is not how nasty the nasty people are. You know that already. It is how nasty the nice people can be.
Everyone always believes everything nasty of everyone else, and especially if it's a lie.
When you say nasty things about people, you should never say the true ones, because you can't really fully and honestly take those back..
What seems nasty, painful, evil can become a source of beauty, joy, and strength, if faced with an open mind.
Everything's very perfectly balanced; for all the horrible things in the world there's lots of good things.
A horrible night might be hidden in a beautiful morning!
It's so horrible to realize you're just the same as everyone else.
It is no wonder that people are so horrible when they start life as children.
It would be horrible to live with someone who didn't like the same things you like.
Everybody had something horrible happen to them at one time or another in their life.
It is dreadful the way all the comfortable, happy people stay off to themselves.
For all things are less dreadful than they seem.
It's dreadful what little things lead people to misunderstand each other.
How dreadful knowledge of the truth can be when there's no help in truth!
The nasty little apes that call themselves human beings can do nothing except run and hide.
Sometimes awful things have their own beauty.
It's an awful risky thing to live.
The expectation of an unpleasantness is more terrible than the thing itself.
Without a vision human beings are nasty creatures.
Only when you're nervous do you get nasty.
When people are nasty, it gets everybody's attention, and it gives them a name.
When you start attacking cronyism and people's political interests, it gets nasty.
People don't very much like things that are beautiful.. they are so far from their nasty little minds.
